text: The Big Nâ€™ Tasty is a hamburger made by the fast food chain McDonald's. It is designed to compete with the Whopper sandwich. ==Product description== The Big N' Tasty has a seasoned quarter-pound () beef meat patty with ketchup, mayonnaise, slivered onions, two dill pickle slices, lettuce, and one tomato slice on a sesame seed bun. ==References== Category:McDonald's foods Category:Fast food
title: Big N' Tasty
